trans-unit.source: Contains information about an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre um gesto de tinta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> contains an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> and the level of likeliness that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> correctly identified the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> contém um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> e o nível de likeliness que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identificado corretamente o gesto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> property to determine the level of likeliness that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> correctly identified the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> propriedade para determinar o nível de likeliness que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identificado corretamente o gesto.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como identificar um gesto em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in the code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos no código.
Obtém o gesto de tinta reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como identificar um gesto em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in the code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos no código.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of confidence that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> has in the recognition of the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nível de confiança que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> tem no reconhecimento do gesto.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como identificar um gesto em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in the code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos no código.
